description_html:
The CHESTNUT is the perfect amalgamation of form and function. Inspired by mid-century modern design, the light’s sophistication and organic beauty make it the ideal installation for any interior space.

Organic. Transformative. Iconic.
Metal light fixture with champagne finish
Fixture can be installed on the ceiling, as a wall sconce or used as decorative art
Available in four standard clusters with four, six, nine or eleven metal plates attached to a singular j-box
The angle of each plate can be adjusted individually
Includes a white diffuser
Custom clusters available
Dimming options available
Custom finishes available
LED option available
